availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Caldwell County Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of Dison Addison McGreger and Margaret Goodacre McGreger. Married to Mary E. Woodruff McGregor. Father of Loton W. McGregor and Mary S. McGregor. Student in Caldwell County, Kentucky, in 1850.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, District 2, p. 348B.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, Princeton, p. 506B.
"John McGregor (1839-1914)," Find A Grave, Memorial #110958496, accessed January 5, 2022, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/110958496.
Kentucky Death Certificates, 1911-1965, Kentucky Office of Vital Statistics, KDLA, Frankfort, KY, File #17053.
